statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, healthcare_provider_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE healthcare_provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT appointment_id, healthcare_provider_id FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments, healthcare_provider_id FROM appointments GROUP BY healthcare_provider_id HAVING total_appointments > 5 ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE insurance_id=101;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location_address='123 Main Street';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, location_address FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 201;
SELECT patient_name, gender, insurance_id FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 5
SELECT patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (3, 6, 9);
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY appointment_time;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-25';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, provider_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_history.medical_condition, medical_history.diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM schedules WHERE AVAILABLE_SLOTS > 0 ORDER BY schedule_date, schedule_start_time;
